title: Ang Industriya ng E-Commerce sa Pilipinas
subStitle: Ang Pinaka Malaking Ecommerce ng Pilipinas
appInstallSources: Minimum Number ng App Installs sa Google Play (Total ng Worldwide Downloads)
contentMerchants: Ang E-commerce na may humigit 100,000 visitors per month o di kaya ay may 100,000 na social media followers lamang ang isinali sa listahan. Ang mga industriya na e-ticketing, financial services, rental services, insurance, delivery service, food & beverage, meta-search, couponing, cashback na ecommerce ay hindi isinali. Ang bilang ng followers ng Sunnies Studios' sa ibat ibang social media pages nito ay in-averaged sa bawat social media platform (Facebook, Instagram & Twitter) bilang ito ay mas nagrerepresenta ng kanilang online followers.

IEMAAwards:
IEMA Awards
Ang iPrice E-Commerce Merchants Award (iEMA) 2016 ay kinikilala ang mga South East Asia E-commerce para sa online consumer popularity. Para sa mga iba pang detalye mag-refer sa link.

title: The Map of E-Commerce Philippines
monthlyVisitsContent: Average Monthly Website Visits Between April 2017-June 2017
appInstallSources: Minimum Number of App installs as per Google Play (Total worldwide downloads)
contentMerchants: E-commerce who received more than 100,000 visitors per-month or 100,000 social media followers are qualified for this list. The following industries were not included in this list: e-ticketing, financial services, rental services, insurance, delivery service, food & beverage, meta-search, couponing, cashback websites and ecommerce who solely provides classified ads/P2P services. All e-commerce who initiated their business as a physical store are not included in this list. The number of followers for Sunnies Studiosï¿½ various social media pages were averaged in each platform (Facebook, Instagram & Twitter) as it is more representative of its online supporters.
